name: selenology
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the scientific study of the physical features of the moon: He wrote a book on geology as applied to selenology.
More examplesFewer examplesThe study of the geology of the Moon falls under the more general field of lunar science, i.e., selenology.The expeditions of astronauts greatly facilitated selenology.
